channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: March is strategy month
item.description: January feels like the start of the year, but there’s always a hangover from the holidays. In the northern Hemisphere, February is dark and dreary and...

item.title: The lonely unicorn
item.description: That’s not what usually happens. If there’s at least one unicorn in the world, it’s likely not the only one. And if one can make a valid English word ...

item.title: … or the highway

item.title: Apple Confirms New ‘Air’ Product Launch Date Will Be This Week In Latest Tease
item.description: There have been plenty of rumors but now we’ve had it confirmed by Apple CEO Tim Cook: a new product is coming this week.

item.title: It’s A Pip! Celebrity Bald Eagle Babies Try To Hatch
item.description: Famous bald eagles Jackie and Shadow have a shot at a family this year. Their eggs are hatching and anyone can follow along on a livestream.

item.title: Seeking metaphor
